issue.message: The attribute `android:allowBackup` is deprecated from Android 12 and higher and may be removed in future versions. Consider adding the attribute `android:dataExtractionRules` specifying an `@xml` resource which configures cloud backups and device transfers on Android 12 and higher.
This folder configuration (`v26`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 28. Merge all the resources in this folder into `mipmap-anydpi`.
Very long vector path (1021 characters), which is bad for performance. Considering reducing precision, removing minor details or rasterizing vector.
The resource `R.mipmap.ic_launcher_round` appears to be unused
The application adaptive icon is missing a monochrome tag
